------

Agent [[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]MOMMYITSME[[/span]]

I'm requesting an amnestization mission at [[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]HOME[[/span]], [[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]MY[[/span]], [[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]HOME[[/span]]. You'll soon be called by the Site Director for breafing. Attached is the right archieve of the memetic agent to be used for this specific mission. No amnestic will be needed.

You can freely look at the image as it shall not affect you. Anyway, reply to me to confirm that it's inoffensive against you.

Yours truly,

Doctor [[span style="color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 0 7px rgba(0,0,0,.5)"]]|_/\/\[[/span]].
